item.description:
Blending With Spirit ~ A Workshop with Brenda Lawrence of the UK.
April 21, 2012 
Once a year we are blessed to have Rev. Brenda Lawrence of the Spiritualist National Union of Great Britain come to teach a workshop for developing Mediums.  Brenda, often teaches at the Arthur Findlay College in Stanstead, England.   She will be bringing her skills and talents to Quincy and doing a full day workshop taking the students deeper into their Mediumistic Abilities. Workshop Fee: $60.  Scholarships available based on need. To register for the workshop, call Joe 508-818-8550. (This is a day-long workshop:  either 10-3, or 11-4 I will need to confirm the time.)  THIS WORKSHOP IS CURRENTLY FULL...WE HAVE STARTED A WAITING LIST.

Brenda will also be available for private readings April 23-27.  To book a reading call Marlowe at 617-510-5244.  Fee is $90 for a 30 - 40 min reading .

group.name: The First Spiritualist Church of Quincy

item.name: Mediumship Workshop w/ Brenda Lawrence (UK)
